channel.title: Learning on Eli’s AI Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on Eli’s AI Journey

item.title: Why I’m Transitioning into AI Engineering
item.description:
Quick intro: I’m shifting from software dev into AI engineering. This blog will track my learning plan, projects, and what I ship.

Projects so far

  • Fallacy Detector iOS app (on-device LLMs)
  • Kaggle Titanic (top 25%)
  • RL checkers agent (lessons learned!)
  • Raspberry Pi cat-deterrent (CV + actuation)

What’s next

  • Course: Generative AI with LLMs
  • Weekly checkpoint quiz posts
  • Deep dives on failures & design choices
